spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatch between 2D plan and 3D model. The 2D shows a large DINING ROOM spanning the lower portion with a distinct WINDOW SEAT/bay condition on the right edge, plus a KITCHEN + PANTRY + UTILITY ROOM + small WC clustered above; the 3D render instead presents a more generic multi-room arrangement with different room boundaries and no clear dining/kitchen zoning matching the plan (E2/E4). Wall alignments do not correspond to the plan’s long continuous walls and offsets (E2). Door locations/orientations do not match the plan’s door swings and openings (E2/E3). Window placement and counts do not match the plan’s specific exterior openings and the window-seat geometry (E2/E1). Proportions of the large dining/kitchen areas are not preserved (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships in the 2D plan (DINING adjacent to KITCHEN; KITCHEN adjacent to PANTRY; UTILITY/WC near CENTRAL HALL) are not reliably represented in the 3D model (E2). Multiple labeled spaces from the plan are not clearly present as distinct rooms (CENTRAL HALL, PANTRY, WINDOW SEAT, ALCOVE, crawlspace access zone) (E1). The 3D appears to introduce additional partitions/rooms not indicated in the provided plan segment (E5). Wall thickness looks visually uniform but does not reflect plan-specific structural wall conditions (limited evidence) and door embeddings are generic/non-matching to the plan’s openings (E2).

furniture_mapping.notes: The 2D plan indicates kitchen fixtures/appliance locations (e.g., REF, sink/counters) and specific built-ins (window seat). The 3D contains minimal/ambiguous fixtures and does not map the kitchen/pantry/utility elements to the plan (E1/E2). Scale of fixtures/doors is generic and not verifiable against the plan dimensions; overall mapping accuracy is very low.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is acceptable and geometry is generally clean with no major mesh tearing (minor blandness only). However, the presentation is closer to a perspective render than a strict architectural/isometric verification view; orthographic fidelity is not clearly maintained (E6). Lighting is flat but functional; composition is clear enough to inspect walls, doors, and windows.

detected_errors.description: Missing WINDOW SEAT/bay geometry shown on the right side of the DINING ROOM in the 2D plan.
Missing clearly defined PANTRY adjacent to the KITCHEN as labeled in the 2D plan.
Missing clearly defined CENTRAL HALL and its specific circulation geometry as shown in the 2D plan.
Missing/unclear UTILITY ROOM and small WC cluster placement relative to kitchen/hall as shown in the 2D plan.
Overall room placement does not match: the large DINING ROOM footprint and its boundaries are not reproduced in the 3D model.
Wall alignment and offsets differ from the plan (3D partitions do not follow the plan’s primary wall lines).
Exterior window locations and counts do not correspond to the plan’s exterior openings along the dining/kitchen sides.
Door orientations/opening directions are inconsistent with the 2D plan’s door swings and positions.
Proportion distortion: the relative size/shape of the main dining/kitchen zone is not preserved compared to the 2D plan.
Hallucinated internal partitions/rooms: the 3D layout introduces room divisions not indicated in the provided 2D plan segment.
Render is not presented in a strict orthographic/isometric verification style (appears mildly perspective), reducing technical comparability.
